item.rel_title: Estimating the maximum daily number of incident COVID-19 cases manageable by a healthcare system
item.rel_abs: The COVID-19 Acute and Intense Resource Tool (CAIC-RT) is an interactive online tool capable of estimating the maximum daily number of incident COVID- 19 cases that a healthcare system could manage given age-based case distribution and severity.
item.rel_authors: Giannakeas, V.; Bhatia, D.; Warkentin, M. T.; Bogoch, I.; Stall, N. M.
